update.description: Update: 06/15/2017: v1.2 - added close cmd windows option - added favorites and filter by favorites - fixed custom dvar not checked but still used issue v1.2.3 - fixed custom dvar always first selection - Added notes button - Added Backup, Copy, Rename tool to context menu - Added Make this map/mod a template to context menu - Added more Wiki stuff v1.2.4 - Added ability to launch Workshop mods and/or maps from launcher - Added GDT Import/Duplicate Analyzer beta tool - Updated wiki stuff - Added bot dvars for mp - Added some width adjustment settings for panels v1.2.5 - Added the GDT Combiner
